name: 楊勝明
objective:
Brushless dc and permanent-magnet synchronous motor have higher efficiency and energy to mass ratio in comparison to the other motors. They are gradually replacing induction motor and widely used in industry.
This course begins with the theory of basic electromagnetic energy conversion, followed by the modeling and vector control theory for permanent-magnet synchronous motor, design and control of brushless dc motors, and the driving circuit design for these motors. Finally, sensorless PM machine control techniques are introduced.
schedule:
1. Electromagnetic energy conversion
2. PM and magnetic circuit, BLDC basics
3. Stator and rotor design
4. Stator and rotor design
5. Motor drive and control
6. Motor drive and control
7. Complex vector transformation
8. PMSM Mathematical model
9. Mid-term exam
10. Vector control
11. Current control
12. Sinusoidal PWM
13. Space Vector PWM
14. Implementation of the control system
15. Sensorless vector control
16. Sensorless vector control
17. Sensorless vector control
18. Final exam

Final exam: 40%
